alert.note: Alert for Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 7:36AM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Gallatin Valley and Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Wind chill values may fall to extremely dangerous levels. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of coldest, and most extreme, wind chills are expected through this morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
